title: Launching problems.
body:
I'm not sure what has happened really, so yesterday (Wednesday) I restarted my computer, played a game of league and left my computer overnight in sleep mode. (Of course I did other stuff between playing a game and sleeping) but today I open my laptop to a few weird things regarding league. 

First thing I noticed was that I couldn't find it on my desktop, and when I find the launcher the file didn't have the logo and rather looked like an empty exe with the name League of Legends. I was like "Okay, not sure what's going on, but lemme just delete it and reinstall." So I did, the files were deleted from my computer via the control panel. Then I reinstalled league, it went by quickly and smoothly. Launcher opened and updated... But then I began having even more troubles.

When this appears

https://i.gyazo.com/b629db566cfb6acc50dce3bf85d2e104.png

I press launch and that's it. The game simply disappears and nothing happens. I'm free to open it again and try again. I've never encountered this issue before, my computer was able to handle league so it's not an issue here. I just don't know what's going on exactly. This is my first time re-installing since the update and it's worrying me. 

Some help would be appreciated.

replies.body: Straaaaange. It almost seems like League was deleted somehow while your pc was asleep. Now that you've uninstalled and are trying to reinstall, it seems like you're running into problems with your OS not allowing the update to run the way it should. Double check that your OS has the right [**permissions**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204134104-Setting-up-your-Permissions) settings for League to scan its files.

I have checked all the permissions, which I have. I have reinstalled the game as an administrator. I have ran the game as an administrator. I have done everything that was suggested in Permissions, reinstalled the game again. Nothing seems to work, and I'm unsure how this is going to be fixed... And this is honestly going to drive me nuts if I can't open league after spending a good penny on the game...

I hope someone can help me.

I've also noticed that the icon is of the old client, not the new one. Idk if this gives any pointers.

https://gyazo.com/6862a27087665c5e89b9816f84cc45b8

That icon should have updated after the client update, so you may actually be launching league from the wrong shortcut. Open your League install directory (C:\Riot Games\League of Legends by default) and look for this LeagueClient.exe. Try opening League from that file and see if that works better. If not, go ahead and hit up our tech guys in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) so that they can take a closer look with you.

https://i.gyazo.com/8a41a586903e670ce2646967b887b4f4.png
Nope it has the old Client logo too. Guess I'll give in a ticket, damn this is really disappointing.

When you right click and choose "open file location" is the LeagueClient file without its proper icon as well? I'm having the same issue as you, I think. I'm working with support currently to try and fix my issue :(
Well I've reinstalled since so the icon is back but i still can't open the actual game. It happened randomly and I've no idea what has caused it
